fields.name: AttachedNetworkConfiguration
fields.description: The configuration of networks being attached to the cluster for use by the workloads that run on this Kubernetes cluster.

fields.name: BgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration
fields.description: The configuration of the BGP service load balancer for this Kubernetes cluster.

fields.name: CloudServicesNetworkId
fields.description: The resource ID of the associated Cloud Services network.

fields.name: CniNetworkId
fields.description: The resource ID of the Layer 3 network that is used for creation of the Container Networking Interface network.

fields.name: DnsServiceIP
fields.description: The IP address assigned to the Kubernetes DNS service. It must be within the Kubernetes service address range specified in service CIDR.

fields.name: PodCidrs
fields.description: The CIDR notation IP ranges from which to assign pod IPs. One IPv4 CIDR is expected for single-stack networking. Two CIDRs, one for each IP family (IPv4/IPv6), is expected for dual-stack networking.

fields.name: ServiceCidrs
fields.description: The CIDR notation IP ranges from which to assign service IPs. One IPv4 CIDR is expected for single-stack networking. Two CIDRs, one for each IP family (IPv4/IPv6), is expected for dual-stack networking.
